doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shafiullah Prodhan
doctor.specialty: Rehab-Physio Specialist of Pain, Paralysis, Sports Injury, Disabilities, Arthritis
doctor.workplace: Associate Professor, International Institute of Health Sciences (IIHS)Lecturer (Ex), Bangladesh Medical College & HospitalConsultant, Dhaka Pain Physiotherapy & Rehabilitation Center (DPRC)President (Acting), Bangladesh Physiotherapy Soceity (BPS)Advisor, Editorial Board, Medicalbd News Portal
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shafiullah Prodhan, Chairman and Consultant at DPRC Ltd., is a renowned rehab-physio specialist with over two decades of experience. A top academic performer, he received district-based scholarships and completed his bachelor’s degree in physiotherapy from NITOR under Dhaka University’s Faculty of Medicine. He further enhanced his expertise with an MS in Disability and Rehabilitation from Bangladesh and a PhD from India, focusing on a comparative study of back pain in urban and rural populations.

doctor.name: Md. Hasan Tareq
doctor.specialty: Pain, Paralysis, Disability & Sports Injury Physiotherapy Specialist
doctor.info: Md. Hasan Tareq is a highly skilled physiotherapy specialist with expertise in pain management, paralysis, disability rehabilitation, and sports injury treatment. Holding a B.Sc (Hons) in Physiotherapy and an MPH, he is dedicated to helping patients recover mobility and improve their quality of life. As an Assistant Professor at Dhaka Medical Institute (DMI), he combines academic excellence with hands-on patient care. He specializes in treating stroke rehabilitation, spinal cord injuries, arthritis, back and neck pain, post-surgical recovery, and sports-related injuries. Patients can consult him at Comfort Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, where he provides personalized physiotherapy solutions. Book an appointment today for expert physiotherapy care and a faster recovery.

chamber.address: Comfort Doctors’ Chamber- 2, Green Road, Dhaka
